label: ham
subject:
Rev 310: merged events changes from samba4 in
	http://samba.org/~tridge/ctdb
body: And this agrees with the other principle which we were affirming,—that the guardians were not to have houses or lands or any other property; their pay was to be their food, which they were to receive from the other citizens, and they were to have no private expenses; for we intended them to preserve their true character of guardians.
